scripts.api:dev: cd api && source venv/bin/activate && fastapi dev main.py
scripts.api:lint:check: cd api && source venv/bin/activate && ruff check .
scripts.api:lint:fix: cd api && source venv/bin/activate && ruff check . --fix
scripts.api:lint:format:: cd api && source venv/bin/activate && ruff format .

api/**/*.py: bash -c 'cd api && source venv/bin/activate && ruff check --fix "$@"' --
bash -c 'cd api && source venv/bin/activate && ruff format "$@"' --
